commandDescription: Generate Apex Trigger for use with Zennify Framework
nameFlagDescription: API Name of SObject to create Trigger For
eventFlagDescription: Events the Trigger should fire for. (i.e. BEFORE_INSERT,BEFORE_UPDATE)
notriggerFlagDescription: Set this flag if you want to exclude creating the Trigger
nohandlerFlagDescription: Set this flag if you want to exclude creating the Handler Class
